import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Phone, Mail, MapPin, Clock, MessageCircle, Send, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const Contact: React.FC = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', city: '', systemSize: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically send the form data to your backend setIsSubmitted(true); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', city: '', systemSize: '', message: '' }); // Reset success message after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => setIsSubmitted(false), 5000); }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: , title: "Phone", details: ["+91 80193 55353"], action: "tel:+918019355353" }, { icon: , title: "Email", details: ["info@abhisolar.com"], action: "mailto:info@abhisolar.com" }, { icon: , title: "Service Areas", details: ["Hyderabad", "Secunderabad", "Warangal"], action: "#" }, { icon: , title: "Working Hours", details: ["Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM", "Saturday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM", "Sunday: Closed"], action: "#" } ]; const cities = [ 'Hyderabad', 'Secunderabad', 'Warangal', 'Nizamabad', 'Khammam', 'Karimnagar', 'Ramagundam' ]; const systemSizes = [ '1kW - 3kW (Residential)', '3kW - 10kW (Large Home)', '10kW - 50kW (Commercial)', '50kW - 100kW (Small Industry)', '100kW+ (Large Industry)' ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background Image */}
{/* Dark Overlay for Better Text Visibility */}
Contact Us Get in touch with our solar experts for a free consultation and quote. We're here to help you go solar!

))}
{info.action !== "#" && ( Contact Now )} ))}

{/* Contact Form */}

Fill out the form below and our solar experts will get back to you within 24 hours with a customized quote and consultation.
